Setting.Name: Ligero::SurveyVotesToDynamicFields###DynamicField
Setting.Description: Mapping of Survey Field IDs to Ticket Dynamic Fields.

Setting.Name: Ligero::DynamicSurvey###SendToValid
Setting.Description: By default, OTRS Surveys are only sent to surveys in Master State. Set this option to Yes if you want to send it to Valid surveys also
